name: MK.MobileDevice.Lite
tagline: MK MobileDevice Lite Library for interfacing with iOS Devices.
body:
### MK MobileDevice Lite
MK MobileDevice Lite provides an interface for communicating with iOS devices developed by MK Industries and released under GPLv3. It can be used for various purposes, such as retrieving device info and saving and retrieving files from the device.

### Using the library
Build the library from source with Visual Studio 2015, or grab the prebuilt binaries from [Releases](https://github.com/mkindustries/MK.MobileDevice.Lite/releases). Then just add an assembly reference to MK.MobileDevice.dll, and you're ready to go!

### Applications
Also check out [MK iToolkit](https://github.com/mkindustries/mkitoolkit), built with this library!
[MK Industries on Acetylene Monkey](http://acetylene.x10.bz/products/mk/)

### Issues? Questions?
Having trouble with MK MobileDevice Lite? Feel free to [contact MK Industries](mailto:mkindustries@acetylene.x10.bz) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
